text:
Time to laugh a lot! We have another hilarious 
lesson with Friends for you and also I have

some fantastic news: we are celebrating 4 Million 
subscribers here on YouTube, so we have something

special planned for you in just a little bit.
But before we get into that, if you are new here

and you would like to understand natives when 
we speak fast and laugh at all the jokes even

without subtitles, then you are in the right place 
because we will help you to not feel lost when you

listen to natives, like Sagar, who says that he's 
amazed that he can understand without any doubts.

You will too, so just hit that Subscribe 
button and the Bell down below to join 4

Million learners from around the world and 
start understanding fast native speech!

Just before you test everything you've 
learned today I wanted to remind you to

not miss out on this huge promotion.
Imagine what it would feel like if

this time next year you could understand 
natives confidently even without subtitles.

Where will these new skills take you? 
Maybe you will be able to travel and

proudly communicate with locals or even 
get a new job and move to another country.

Anything is possible if you set your mind 
to it and we want to help you achieve it

with our courses, so take advantage! 
Be one of the first 150 to join and get

our two most popular courses at a tiny price.
Click the link below and use coupon code GIFT4.
